website_summaries.verdict: If you can afford $249.99 to avoid typing your contacts into your address book or PDA, this machine will keep your wrists rested.
pros: compatible with Windows and PDA programs

customer_reviews.title: Good for what it is
customer_reviews.text: Great product. It does what it says, and does it well. Most cards are scanned and recognized perfectly, including ones with non-white backgrounds and ones printed vertically. The software has almost all the features I could want, like the "find duplicate cards" feature. (Because if you go to the same trade shows and see the same people, chances are you have more than a few duplicates in that pile of cards.) I do wish the scanner itself was a tad smaller. Or, for the price, I think it should have a feeder so it could scan a stack of cards at once, instead of hand-feeding each one... But it still works well and saves tons of time as it is.
customer_reviews.author: R. Brome

customer_reviews.title: Poor Customer Support
customer_reviews.text: I have used the Cardscan 700 for some time but had to change laptop. Downloaded the SW and added all the numbers, but nothing worked. Downloaded SW again and repeated the tedious work of entering all the number once more....but nothing worked. Contacted DYMO Customer Support which never responded. PLEASE do not buy anything from DYMO that include software.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: CardScan Executive 700
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product & I got a fantastic deal on it. Only problem is that the driver that comes with it is obsolete so it has to be downloaded online. I downloaded it to my work computer and it worked fine. By the time I tried to download it on my home computer, the link was no longer available. So, I can only use it at work.
customer_reviews.author: Kim B.

customer_reviews.title: First Impression Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: Tried to install. No driver included apparently. Couldn't find a driver down load on the site. Tech support is "closed" at 3 pm PDT. Can't return it either because I opened it.
customer_reviews.author: P. Wentworth

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: The seller never got back to me when I asked him questions. The scanner can only scan black on white business cards. The product doesn't come with its driver, so you have to look for it by yourself and when you ask info they don't get back to you.
customer_reviews.author: Luca Zambello

customer_reviews.title: cardscan executive 700
customer_reviews.text: I have been working with the card scanner for about a month. Took a stack of 150 cards and went thru them in about 30 minutes. It's great if you don't have the time to input them by hand. It just takes a fraction of the time for manual entry. Would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: bbarden

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This scanner is small and light but feels very well built. It works as advertised and I wouldn't hesitate to recommend it for card scanning.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Card Scan doesn't work out
customer_reviews.text: I recently upgraded to the latest Card Scan Executive 700. I have installed and reinstalled several times but cannot get it to function. After checking the internet I have discovered I am not the only one with this complaint. I have Windows XP professional and there seems to be an issue. I am awaiting a response from the Card Scan tech site. I simply can't recommend this product. My first card scan was a piece of cake and worked unfailingly for several years. I'm disappointed that it is more difficult now than my original card scanner!
customer_reviews.author: L. Simons

customer_reviews.title: Cardscan Results
customer_reviews.text: A very useful product. I use this routinely and then I can also export the contact data into other applications. Use the new software, available on Avery's website, which bought CardScan and you'll have good results.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great seller - quick shipping, personalized attention, and no product issues. All necessary items included (i.e.manuals, installation cd, and serial number etc). Though there are newer versions available, this one is a great value and perfect for personal / smaller databases.
customer_reviews.author: C.E.

customer_reviews.title: Scans, but somewhat ineffecient to transfer to DB mgmt software
customer_reviews.text: The CardScan does capture fields fairly well though it may make mistakes on about 4 or 5 cards of 10 - you must verify each cards info after it is input (not a big deal). My problem comes from the softwares inability to flag the newly inputted contacts for follow up - when I export/transfer them to my ACT! 2005 Database, I can't seperate them instantly from newly inputted cars and have to hunt them down - no big deal, but I find it's easier just ot input the data seperately anyway. HTHs. JOE
customer_reviews.author: JOE

customer_reviews.title: CardScan
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product that, given the difficult task it is asked to do, does a wonderful job. The only limitation os the synchronization software with Outlook. The software has the typical problems of software written by techies and not by ordinary users but overall, the hardware is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Morris Shinderman

customer_reviews.title: Easy To Use - Time Saver
customer_reviews.text: I like this product very much. The install and use of the CardScan Executive 700 couldn't be easier, and it saves so much time if you are entering info manually.
customer_reviews.author: T.M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Concept
customer_reviews.text: This never was an easy to use device since it required SO much time "fixing" the missed words, letters, numbers, etc. on business cards. I would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely great product..
customer_reviews.text: CardScan Executive 700 Compact Business Card Scanner is a great product. Fast, efficient and small. Worth every penny..
customer_reviews.author: Metin Sen

customer_reviews.title: Will not work with 64 bit OS
customer_reviews.text: Note this will not work with a modern operating system (64 bit) and the company has decided not to every write a driver for x64 machines. So unless you use XP, don't buy this one.
customer_reviews.author: W. K.

customer_reviews.title: Great productivity tool!
customer_reviews.text: This was my second CardScan system, both have been great. I purchased this one more for the new software than the scanner. I needed the new software so it would interface better with Lotus Notes, which it does. The scanner is great also; it provides fast and clear scans that work well with the included OCR software to load the data to the CardScan database. The Cardscan database interfaces with many contact database systems to provide updated contact information through exports or synching of data. If you need to contact customer service for CardScan they are fast and efficient in dealing with issues. Overall a great product and efficiency enhancement tool.
customer_reviews.author: D. Drakeley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Self Employed and Love this thing. Great Card designs all out of your home.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony I.

customer_reviews.title: Best Time Saving Product
customer_reviews.text: The CardScan Executive 700 has been the best time saver for me. As a salesman, I get many business cards and the information has to be put into my database. The CardScan make it so easy to save time and when it syncs with Outlook, everything is there for me to be able to stay in touch with my Contacts. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Tyre Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Zippy Scan
customer_reviews.text: We love the card scanner, it's the best. Everyone who is a recruiter should have one it saves time and space.
customer_reviews.author: C. Segovia

customer_reviews.title: CardScan
customer_reviews.text: This little device is really awesome! I am going to buy one for my son. Works like a charm, and its software is incredibly "talented" in picking the correct information off every type of card imaginable.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent assistant to keep tag of name and addresses
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for three years. It is an excellent way to keep tab of business cards collected in a trip.
customer_reviews.author: D. Casal

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: CardScan Executive 700 Compact Business Card Scanner is a great product. Fast, efficient and small. Worth every penny.. If I well recommend a card scanner, I well recommend this one
customer_reviews.author: A. Rahman Alkhulaifi

customer_reviews.title: CardScan Exec 700
customer_reviews.text: It was purchased for one of our VP and he like it a lot he said it is a time saver.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Taylor

customer_reviews.title: CardScan Executive 700
customer_reviews.text: This is a great business tool. I'd recommend it to anyone who wants to keep a database but doesn't want to spend a lot of time inputting data.
customer_reviews.author: Chet

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: We Brought this unit for our Trade Show. Wowow It was Soooooooo Good.
customer_reviews.author: K,Xu

product_meta.title: CardScan Executive 700 Compact Business Card Scanner
product_meta.description:
FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Announcing the CardScan Executive 700, the latest generation of the world's best-selling business card reader. It's half the size and weight of the previous Executive and far more powerful. Imagine scanning a business card in just two seconds. Finding contacts is even faster and easier, using a completely redesigned user interface. And the sleek new design looks great on your desk, in just half the space. CardScan Executive offers Corex's fastest scanning speed, full compatibility with every popular contact program and portable device, and advanced features like color scanning, storing your contacts on the Web, making fail-safe backups, and offering a contact information updating service.

 Imagine all of your business cards in one very powerful system. Need to confirm a meeting? You find the contact's business card on your computer instantly, along with the notes you wrote on the back. Click on the email address, and a pre-addressed email pops up. Click on the street address, and Mapquest gives you directions to your meeting. The real genius of CardScan is how it saves time you didn't even know you were wasting, in ways you didn't know were possible. Let's say you only remember a few letters of an address or phone number. CardScan still finds your contact quickly. It syncs to other contact managers and portable devices, and makes your records Web-accessible. CardScan even keeps your records updated.

 CardScan Executive Scanner Features: 

 * 50% smaller and lighter than previous model, takes less desktop space 
 * 2-second black-and-white scan, 4-second color scan; scan more cards in less time 
 * USB powered, 2.0 certified; more portable and convenient 
 * Sleek new product design, looks great on your desk 

CardScan Executive Software Features:  * More intuitive interface is easier to use, more productive 
 * Improved character recognition means more accurate records 
 * Faster, easier installer preserves your settings 
 * Efficient "find duplicates" feature eliminates redundant records 
 * Enhanced card correction highlights fields it thinks may contain errors 

What's in the Box
Scanner, detachable USB cable, software, user's guide, warranty card
feature_bullets: Stores and organizes business cards electronically
Produces 3-4 second color and 2-second monochrome scans
Includes software to search and manage card storage

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.0 out of 5 stars33 ratings3.0 out of 5 stars
